website_summaries.verdict: The Paww WaveSound 2 headphones use noise-cancellation circuitry that has an undeniably negative impact on audio performance.
cons: Noise cancellation is average at best and has a significant impact on audio performance
Noise-canceling mics create noise of their own at times

customer_reviews.title: Great noise control for folks sensitive to loud noise
customer_reviews.text: Freaking awesome environmental control for those of us sensitive to noise due to TBI, autism, wiring, other head injury etc. My 18 year old dryer virtually disappeared and I was able to hear my son and the television program without any difficulty. My son has big ears and we both have big Welsh heads and these fit us well. I live in an area with loose fireworks laws and horrible noise for many hours on an Independence Day weekend. I have ptsd. I am happy I got these headphones and will be using them for a long time. They drown out a lot of noise but not the frequencies you need for hearing speech, sirens or announcements.
customer_reviews.author: Dorsie L. Hathaway

customer_reviews.title: I was fairly pleased with these headphones untill the right ear pad popped ...
customer_reviews.text: Headphones broke after two days of use. Despite shipping debacle, and various problems listed in other reviews which are accurate , I was fairly pleased with these headphones untill the right ear pad popped off and refused to snap back on. Now they are not functional.
customer_reviews.author: Random289

customer_reviews.title: NC does not work when hard wired. Sound Tinny. Battery would not hold a charge
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed at fact the noise cancelling does not work when plugged in via the actual corded way. It only works if you are using bluetooth But even if that was not the case.. I charged these out of the box and got like 10 minutes of runtime.. Charged again.. same thing.. Maybe they have sat on shelves too long DUNNO.. But left me stranded during a flight Even during the poor 10 minutes of use on bluetooth the sound was overly TINNY with noise cancelling enabled. Cannot recommend these and I am sending them back
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars.
customer_reviews.text: The wavesound2 is awesome... cancelling the exterior noises... the sound is surround... wow... I can't hear my voice. For real... nor tv... nor even in the bathroom the fan.... These headphones are so strong so well built lightweight and user friendly... Strange not hearing oneself... lol... never had experienced this... even when the sound is minimal... you're going to love it... I do already just for a few minutes... wanted to test a call... The pairing is done when u touch the cellphone with wavesound2 ... it appears immediately to pair... Awesome. 5 stars most def... and having attention to the price... 62.99 (sale) dolars only compared to those much more expensive ones...
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Marqs

customer_reviews.title: Good, while they last.
customer_reviews.text: While I appreciated these headphones, 4 months into using the headphones the right twisting hinge that keeps the right phone against the head has worn out and now hangs loose against the head. Noise cancelling independent of Bluetooth reacieving was good. Being able to recharge them via micro USB was good, however. the right phone no longer holding solid against the head is a 100% deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Hasteur

customer_reviews.title: which is great for a 6-year-old
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two sets, WaveSound 2 and WaveSound 3. My granddaughter uses the WaveSound 2 set, which is great for a 6-year-old. I use to buy cheap headphones and finally invested in more substantial ones. They cup the ear just right and cancel unwanted noise. A newscaster mentioned them on a news segment which is how I found out about them. A number of retail outlets offer a cheap set of wired noise canceling earphones; if you want a better set, the next option is $350 plus dollars. Don't fall for this. These offer the technology at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: I'm too cheap to buy Beats, but these headphones are a great 'value' option.
customer_reviews.text: I had a chance to put these headphones to the test and I can't be happier with them. While I'm sure there are better headphones at a far higher price point, these headphones, in the $60 range are a great bargain. I used the noise cancelling feature while running a lawn mower that is loud enough to completely drown out normal headphones, and I was amazed that I could effectively, and easily hear the spoken audio through the Paww headphones. I didn't even have to turn them all the way up which was amazing to me. I plan to try them next week on a business flight, and I anticipate great results. Very happy, would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Garn

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Headphones that satisfy a music professional
customer_reviews.text: Got these for me, but then my girlfriends earbuds broke.. So I gave these to her. She loves them. If your looking for a quality over the ear headphone, this is it. I like the fact that these can be used either wired or bluetooth. You can tell this is a quality item, because they even took the time to make a high-end box that these ship in. My girlfriend is a music professional, and has told me that these are some good headphones that are clear and play her music to her liking. I would recommend these headphones if your looking to get a good-quality set.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: and comfortable fit. However
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality for the price, and comfortable fit. However, the noise canceling feature does not work when you plug into an outlet, rather than use the blue tooth. I bought this product for long airline trips where I watch the provided in-flight entertainment that requires you to plug into an outlet. I did write the company, and their solution was for me to buy a blue tooth adaptor. That's good and all, but now that's just one more electronic device to lug around in my carry-on. I will add that they do have a disclaimer now on their Amazon page highlighting this. Please be aware of this feature (or lack there of) before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Use them every day
customer_reviews.text: Our neighbors have two small dogs who bark consistently throughout the day. I read the reviews and I am really glad I bought these. I've been suckered into buying more expensive headphones before and I never liked them enough to routinely use them. Not only do the Paww headphones work as described, they're really comfortable. They also last a long time on a charge and handle lower volumes really well. The case they come with is well designed to protect the headphones and the USB cable is great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Katharine

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Noise canceling is pretty good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Noise canceling is pretty good. With music its pretty much perfect. Fits on my head at the largest setting ( I have a big head that is kind of pointy :) ). Charge lasts a long time and I was able to pair it to my 3 devices including my USB BT adapter. Its comfortable but takes some getting used to especially on the top of my head. But after a week I don't feel it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher E. Warnke

customer_reviews.title: They were extremely comfortable. I listen to tanks with a lot of ...
customer_reviews.text: I just finished a 2hr workout with these on the entire time. They were extremely comfortable. I listen to tanks with a lot of HIs and booming bass. All the sounds are very clean and clear. The microphone picks up your voice clearly allowing you to make phone calls. The button control are easy to use and responsive. The build quality is solid. I'm extremely pleased and plan to buy another set as a gift. I will update this soon about the battery life. It says 36 hour play time. I've logged 2 hours this far at high volume.
customer_reviews.author: Leroy Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: I felt that they were pretty heavy coming out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I've only had them for a couple of days so this is my first impression. I felt that they were pretty heavy coming out of the box, but on my head I didn't notice the weight. As far as the sound, they didn't really bowl me over, but they delivered a sound that I didn't find distractive or offensive. That's to say that I found the sound almost balanced and didn't feel that they were really base driven as I've read in some reviews, yet nothing really stood out as exceptional. Again, this is a first impression. I've only worn them once but can say that I enjoyed that initial experience.
customer_reviews.author: Darnell French

customer_reviews.title: When closing your door just isn't enough. Get these!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the sole purpose of drowning out my co-workers, but now (because they're so comfy) I'm wearing them all over the place! I pair them to my laptop when I'm in the office, and to my phone when I'm not. The range is enough that I can leave my office, scan, make copies, ignore everyone, etc. They sound great, and the battery life is much better than I expected. I'm not an audiophile, and don't need to hear every subtle nuance in my music, so for me these are exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: DMC

customer_reviews.title: I really like these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I really like these headphones, they sound great. Feel extremely sturdy - have a little weight to them due to it's metal design in places. Heavy enough when you're holding them to feel their sturdiness, but not heavy at all when wearing them. Comes with a superb storage case - I was shocked! Braided accessory wires to top it off. This didn't *have* be done, but doing so demonstrates the Paww's integrity. You won't be disappointed making this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ScotB

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great with one fatal flaw that means I'll be returning these
customer_reviews.text: It's light, comfortable, buttons make enough sense and call clarity is pretty good. The bad is mostly with the sound only when noice cancellation is on. It somehow takes some of the bass out and gives it this hollow sound. Unfortunate, since I mostly want it with ANC activated. The sound is quite right when ANC is off but defeats the purpose when that all goes out the window when you turn it on. It's as if the ANC is interfering with the sound from the headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Tech.Tennis

customer_reviews.title: I would rate them higher like 9 of 10
customer_reviews.text: The reason I rated the Paww Wavesound 2 a 3 out of 5 is the lack of punchy bass; on all other dimensions such as build, functions, treble, midrange, I would rate them higher like 9 of 10. The lack of punchy bass was a deal-breaker for me. If you want and solidly built set of cans with a more neutral sound overall they are fine. If you're looking for nice strong tight bass that you want to feel as well as hear I would really ecommend you look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Otero

customer_reviews.title: the sound quality when listening to music is great, though nothing like the Bose QCs
customer_reviews.text: For the price paid, these headphones get the job description be. Surprisingly, the sound quality when listening to music is great, though nothing like the Bose QCs. The noise cancelling feature, again, does the job, and I can't wait to test these on an airplane or flight. What bothered me most was the creaking of the headset band, the part that goes over my head. It would constantly creak, even while I have I the headphones on my head. For the price, though, these are small things that I could live with.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Lovin'  feeling
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this set and one from another company at the same time - one for her and one for me on an upcoming long airplane ride. Compared the two and immediately knew that this one is mine. These are great - outside noise almost all gone. One very noticeable difference it that with the noise cancelling on, the music sound 100% better - clear and crisp. With cancelling off, music sounds more muffled. Easy bluetooth setup.
customer_reviews.author: Cowboy Bob

customer_reviews.title: Use these to complete computer work at graduate school. ...
customer_reviews.text: Use these to complete computer work at graduate school. Clarity very important due to extensive use of medical terminology. They block out surrounding noise and allow me to clearly hear subtle differences in words. Very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: renegade1234

customer_reviews.title: Good for price,  comfortable, NC not good.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Comfortable decent sound Bluetooth works fine seems pretty sturdy comes with a nice case cons: Noise cancelling not even noticeable, turn it on...nothing Overall, if you don't expect active noise cancelling then these are a good value. The cups do block some sound so that is nice.
customer_reviews.author: rcvc

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!
customer_reviews.text: When I sit in my office, I share walls with To the south- railroad tracks. To the west- a materials testing lab with air compressors, fans, etc To the north- a hallway. To the east- a woman that sneezes often. I bought these headphones to help me concentrate. They're much better with music on and in ANC and have greatly improved my ability to work.
customer_reviews.author: KidaZ

customer_reviews.title: OK for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Headphone sounds best without noise cancelling. Noise cancelling works very well. The headphones are comfortable for hours on end. Bluetooth was easy to pair and works well even at 30 foot distance. Cons: when using the headphones for a cell phone call, persons on the other side of the call say my voice sounds muffled. Also I get complaints of clunking noise because the joints on the earmuffs are loose and are caused to wiggle as my jaw moves.
customer_reviews.author: david q. king

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, good sound, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use on a long flight but didn't need them since they were provided. Did get to use them on a different flight that had a screaming child during the entire trip. The noise cancelling feature made the trip tolerable. Wanted over-the-ear style, which these are, and found them to be a very comfortable fit. Though the band is padded it became uncomfortable resting on my head. I was able to extend the side far enough to relieve the pressure. I tested the sound using my PC and found it to be excellent. Though the case is bulky I intend to use it on future flights.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well but is not comfortable for long use
customer_reviews.text: The product works as expected, except that the headphones are heavy and not comfortable to use for long periods of time. 30 mins is the max I can wear them at a time, after which my ears feel like they have been compressed. The ear cups seem soft but something about the general design makes them tight. The Bluetooth works well with Android, Windows and Apple products, the audio quality is decent and the mike works well. Charge also holds for 8-12 hrs without NC.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, but missing something...
customer_reviews.text: I eventually returned these headphones because there just wasn't enough of the sound I wanted coming from them. The noise cancellation worked pretty good, but the sound just seemed to be missing bass and cleanliness.
customer_reviews.author: Good Grief

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Not Bose, but VERY well made. I'm using these to drown out machine noise in our woodworking shop, with and without bluetoothed music. I consider these a very, very good value for the price. A rare occurrence these days, I feel like these offer more of a product than I paid for, and I appreciate it.
customer_reviews.author: Anton Stayduhar

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is very nice and I love how easy it is to connect ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is very nice and I love how easy it is to connect to Bluetooth. I use it when I'm cooking and the anti noise setting work's great and I can listen to my music easily. The headset is comfortable too. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Serina

customer_reviews.title: best headphones I've ever had.
customer_reviews.text: Oh these are so wonderful I love them. Active noise cancelling was what I wanted most. This is powerfully quiet! Amazing. Product so far has done everything it stated it would do. I will not be returning these. Unless of course a major disaster happens. If you're curious go ahead take a chance. You'll fall in love too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Paww is the best - period.
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best headphones for the money. I can't say enough about the sound quality - IT"S AWESOME! The noise canceling works extremely well, in fact when using them I hate to take them off as the world sounds better with them on. You will not regret buying these headphones. The Paww WaveSound 2 are in my experience and opinion the best. Although they did just come out with version 3, I might have to buy those too. Quality and manufacturing details were on point and if you have questions they responded lighting fast. Why are you still reading this? Click and to cart and make your life better.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Mayton

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and nice sound
customer_reviews.text: I originally reviewed a damaged set I received, but after contacting PAWW, they immediately did an exchange for me and I got a working pair. They're nice and comfortable, and easy to pair with my iPhone. It'd be nice if they could get louder, but turning on noise cancelling helps with that. Pro: comfortable, easy to use, haven't had battery life issues Con: could use higher max volume, mic only works in bluetooth
customer_reviews.author: Howard K.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money for sure!
customer_reviews.text: These work wonderfully. I've only had them a couple of weeks: but they do the job better than advertised and are very comfortable. Now the cold is starting where I live I would like the headset to be able to expand more to fit over my knit cap, but I can get a decent fit now with a little work. Fantastic value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: CarlsThunder

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: yes love these very good sound lots of battery life I would recommend these to anyone looking for wireless headphones love these and would definetly buy again they answer calls easy and the mic is great you can hear clear. The only thing is when you go to far away from the computer it will distort but all in all I would definetly rate these 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Luella Klock

customer_reviews.title: I love the PAWW headset
customer_reviews.text: I love the PAWW headset. I travel a lot and can actually hear the movies on the airplane nice an clearly now. Sound is great. Could do with a little more bass, but that is being picky. They do not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: I ordered these after I was disappointed in the wireless performance of a more expensive pair ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these after I was disappointed in the wireless performance of a more expensive pair of earphones. So far so good. Sound quality is decent and the cancellation works relatively well, although not quite as well as the pair I sent back. The only annoyance I have is the multifunction skip/volume buttons are aren't the best design, but it is simple. I did notice that the headphones unpaired from by phone a few times for whatever reason, but not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Sheth

customer_reviews.title: Great all around headphones, until they break
customer_reviews.text: Great set of headphones with all the features I wanted (Bluetooth and active noise canceling) and one I was pleased to discover: a removable battery! They fit well enough to be comfortable being worn all day at work (office). However, after about a year, one of the swivel joints on the headphones popped out and they didn't close around my ears any more. If you get these, spring for the warranty so you can buy a better pair when they break. I just ordered a replacement set of seinheiser headphones...
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Consider passive noise cancellation
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use while mowing my yard. Understandably, that's a difficult environment. They do provide some noise cancellation. However, the audio quality is quite disappointing, and quiet enough that I can't really hear music. I think if you're looking for noise cancellation for severe noise environments in this price bracket you might be better off going with passive noise cancellation and better audio quality. These might be better for less severe environments. However, even with less noise, the audio quality is weak.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had issues but they were corrected.
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing 2 sets of these one went out on the initial charge. I was able to work with customer service an receive a replacement set. Sound quality is reasonable however volume is lower than expected. Overall pleased even with the problems, as the issues were resolved in a reasonable fashion.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Average Nothing Special
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are decent nothing great nothing horrible about them. Sound is average, design and comfort is good, nice case. Noise cancellation doesn't seem to do anything. If I could go back in time I'd probably just go with a cheaper $30 pair as there's nothing special about these.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, setup, and sound!!
customer_reviews.text: A very fine product. On Time, as expected. Easy to set up. Great sound. Unfortunately the fit on my head was tight on top of head and couldn't wear very long. Had to return, but really recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bru Huf

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound and noise reduction, I use this on my riding mover and have very little issues hearing the music. Lost a star because I wish there were someway to keep it from sliding back and forth on my head when I bend over or look down.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Von Wert

customer_reviews.title: Yeah no.
customer_reviews.text: One of the headphones kept going in and out after only a couple of weeks. A regrettable purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Xlebster Wisnia

customer_reviews.title: on/off switch is GREAT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! It has an on/off switch which is extremely important if you don't want to waste time holding buttons down for 5 seconds every time you turn on or off your device. The sound is great. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: noondoo

customer_reviews.title: comfortable decent quality sound for the price point
customer_reviews.text: as reviews read minus the heavy comments don't get those? comfortable decent quality sound for the price point. have not flown with them yet so too early to evaluate the noise cancellation component but when I tried it at home I did as reviews have stated notice the sound quality was not as good. But for the price I am happy!
customer_reviews.author: ron newman

customer_reviews.title: these had terrible bluetooth and never worked without the aux cable
customer_reviews.text: these had terrible bluetooth and never worked without the aux cable. this had terrible earpieces and one came loose and fell off and got lost right away. terribly cheap plastic
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: They are incredibly comfortable, and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Took a little while for my computer to recognize them, but after the first day I didn't have anymore issues with them. They are incredibly comfortable, and lightweight. They block out noise like a charm, too! An absolute great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Comfortable, Buzzy
customer_reviews.text: I'm a casual music lover and I wanted quality over-ear bluetooth headphones to listen to my podcasts and songs. This is exactly what I got. The headphones have a great sound range and are very comfortable. I use it with my Galaxy s6 and it connects easily to my phone. The sound quality isn't as amazing as I had expected it to be, for example, in my songs it sound like the singers voice has a weird buzz to it. Other than the buzzed voices, the bass is very boomed and the clarity is crystal.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Sound
customer_reviews.text: I love the sound quality. I bought these because pre-formed headsets (behind the head) don't accommodate my large head size. These are great, all except if you do exercises at the gym which require lowering your head (sit-ups on a slant board), the weight of the headset makes it slip off.
customer_reviews.author: S. Jenson

customer_reviews.title: These are quite awesome. THE COMPANY IS GREAT TO WORK WITH
customer_reviews.text: These are quite awesome. THE COMPANY IS GREAT TO WORK WITH. THEY REPLACED A BROKEN PAIR THAT WAS TWO DAYS OUT OF WARRANTY. THANK YOU VERY MUCH! We bought two sets of these!!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Deering

customer_reviews.title: Good quality head phone
customer_reviews.text: I first felt that it was heavy. But now after getting used to it, I feel that this head phone was worth it. All my previous headphones got damaged due to handling issues. This one comes with a hard case cover and that makes it a good product overall
customer_reviews.author: Nibin

customer_reviews.title: Nice headphones. Bass response is good but not over ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice headphones. Bass response is good but not over the top. Connects to my iPhone right away. Very comfortable without a lot of "wear fatigue" which can occur with headphones. Good value for the dollar
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A Kintanar

customer_reviews.title: Good quality great performance
customer_reviews.text: These work very well.I am extremely impressed. They do compare with Bose I n my opinion. They are heaier but the quality is good l Blue tooth works very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie J Jolley

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: pretty sure the noise canceling doesn't work, switch between the different settings and can't tell any difference at all.
customer_reviews.author: Steve D.

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Bluetooth works well, and the noise cancelling does help with background noise. I don't think the sound quality is as good as on wired headphones, but the convenience of Bluetooth is undeniable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty poor item.
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy, uncomfortable to wear. Audio is ok, but microphone use is pretty useless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Annoying sound
customer_reviews.text: I like them well enough and use them frequently. I'm not sure if it's mine or all noise cancelling headphones but there tends to be this sound emanating from the headphones that sounds like a plumber on my ear.
customer_reviews.author: Mike & Brittnie

customer_reviews.title: Bad out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for Christmas and they had feed back in the right ear cup from the get go. Also had problems in noice canceling mode with sound continuity. They were extremely comfortable. May have been a bad pair. Too bad I had to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie M. Tallent

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I got a pair for my husband ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I got a pair for my husband and I initially. I got another pair for a child. Good price great sound. Great distance range from device.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey R. Willman

customer_reviews.title: everything is great, if I loose these I will immediately get ...
customer_reviews.text: These are outstanding headphones, everything is great, if I loose these I will immediately get them again. They are comfortable and last all day. Feel very high quality, connects quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Henthorn

customer_reviews.title: Lacks wired connection mic capabilities.
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that when using only a wired connection the mic will not work at all which is what hinders this headset from working with almost every product such as a ps4. Now I agree with others that the sound is great and have not really trailed noise cancelation but seems to work well as long as fully sealed around your ear.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Tin cans with a bluetooth connection.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: The price and the features are fantastic. These paired without a problem with my desktop, bluetooth record player and the NFC connection to my iPhone was a simple tap. Cons: The sound is awful. It's basically like hearing music through tin cans. No lows and poor mediums.
customer_reviews.author: Thom

customer_reviews.title: They look and sound like really high priced headphones but for less than a ...
customer_reviews.text: Banging headphones really put togeather well. They look and sound like really high priced headphones but for less than a hundred bucks you get that look and sound.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great noise-cancelling headphone for the value
customer_reviews.text: Great noise-cancelling headphone for the value. I can't compare to others since I haven't owned others, but I luv these!
customer_reviews.author: J.Rocha

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sound!!
customer_reviews.text: Superb sound quality, easy to set up and use...and a GREAT PRICE!
customer_reviews.author: Robert DiCiccio

customer_reviews.title: The only negative comment I would make is they are not as comfortable as the Sony headset I'm replacing only because the ...
customer_reviews.text: The headset works as advertised. The only negative comment I would make is they are not as comfortable as the Sony headset I'm replacing only because the Sony isn't bluetooth capable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fall apart easily
customer_reviews.text: I liked the sound quality of the headphones but they fell apart not too long after I started using them. I've had to repair them numerous times and no have them held together to large clips.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Works as bluetooth or noise cancelling, not both at the same time as far as I can tell. (Switch has OFF-BT-NC) Can work corded (for devices that don't have bluetooth). Plugs in to charge. Bluetooth has good volume. Part that cover ears rotate to fit in case. Solid (not soft) case. I haven't tested the noise cancelling in noisy places.
customer_reviews.author: chtrbx

customer_reviews.title: They are bigger than I thought.
customer_reviews.text: They are bigger than I thought. Primary use was for air travel but did't realize how big on my head they would be compared to other but more expensive bluetooth models
customer_reviews.author: SAC

customer_reviews.title: The description was accurate.
customer_reviews.text: A bit heavy. I haven't taken my plane trip yet so don't know how they will work for that, but as speakers they seem to be what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: charlotte williams

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Yay Yay Yay!! pre mature birthday gift husband loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Agliano

customer_reviews.title: but they are not that comfortable. I might not be the average reviewer because ...
customer_reviews.text: It's ok sound, but they are not that comfortable. I might not be the average reviewer because my head is larger than average. I'm 6'5" and have a 4x motorcycle helmet. These are tight & uncomfortably situation in order to fit around my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Given to my son as a gift which he enjoys
customer_reviews.author: luluko

customer_reviews.title: Sound a little muffled
customer_reviews.text: I think they sound a little muffled - tried all the settings but could not achieve the sound I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J Rondeau

customer_reviews.title: Love my PAWW headphones
customer_reviews.text: Love my PAWW headphones. I will say the active noise cancellation isn't super strong. There's a drop in outside noise but not silence. The quality is great though- and they are super comfortable! Extremely pleased.
customer_reviews.author: J. Williams

customer_reviews.title: At a level 10 these sound like a 5
customer_reviews.text: Am I missing a "loud" button? At a level 10 these sound like a 5. Great design but for noise canceling these should be a lot louder...?!
customer_reviews.author: Damon

customer_reviews.title: They work well with the Android phone they sound good no problems
customer_reviews.text: They work well with the Android phone they sound good no problems. I've only had them about a week but so far so good . The ear pieces are nice and cushy
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Grigsby

customer_reviews.title: Best for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones for the price. Sound quality is great. Says Noise reduction....if so very little. But, I still feel you cannot beat the quality and sound of this headset for the price. FIVE STARS.
customer_reviews.author: Rayrock

customer_reviews.title: OK for flights
customer_reviews.text: Reduces noise on flight. Not too uncomfortable while wearing glasses. The ear cuff could be a little larger, and the headset could be lighter. The NR does produce some annoying popping sounds, and you can hear the announcements by the flight crew.
customer_reviews.author: mike0

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the Price, Noise-Reducing, Bluetooth, comfy headphones
customer_reviews.text: easy to set up, easy to use, seems to be a really good value for the price. I like that it has the noise reduction feature. That is a big plus for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great sound good value
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones. Very well made sound is clear and lots of detail with just the right amount of bass.
customer_reviews.author: robmc

customer_reviews.title: Great if you want to end up with a headache
customer_reviews.text: They are so incredibly heavy and uncomfortable as they just sit on top of my head. Great if you want to end up with a headache.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: I loved everything about them till they started a high pitch beep beep every minute. Why it does it I don't know.  Useless now.
customer_reviews.text: Sound super and the noise cancellation works great. Just wish the ear pieces were bigger.
customer_reviews.author: jcrazy

customer_reviews.title: Love these headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I've now had these for about 5 months, I've worn them on countless flights and daily at my desk in the office. Very comfortable and couldn't be happier with the clarity and cushioning of the headphones. LOVE!
customer_reviews.author: RAWiesner

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied. Good sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking, sound quality is the best. But noise cancelling function is only average.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny P. Chow

customer_reviews.title: Good,  but heavy.
customer_reviews.text: Good sound, connects quickly via Bluetooth. Somewhat heavy to wear, and volume decreases a bit more than I would like when using the noise cancelling capability.
customer_reviews.author: MandolinDan

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: They were great till they came apart, the padding come out.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Nice design, comfortable and heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Nice design, comfortable and heavy duty. Nice packaging. Sound is good when not in noise cancellation mode. With higher noise levels (like on a plane), you get distorted highs and lows with noise cancellation on - adjusting equalizer settings didn't help much.
customer_reviews.author: DF

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and little bass
customer_reviews.text: Good sound and little bass. I hoped it would have worked with my VOIP Cisco phone via USB, but did not. My [broken] Jabra REVO wireless worked this way. Jabra sucks as they would not replace flimsy plactic top.
customer_reviews.author: URB

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Complete waste of money, I had 2 flights 1 8 hours the other 9. The headphones came unpaired in the airport before the first flight and never would pair again to BT or NFC. Total disappointment. Had to buy wired earbuds to use.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Brafford

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great packaging, very happy with the product. Great price. Paired instantly with my iPad. Comfortable to wear. Great value
customer_reviews.author: R & C Polino

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: For the price these headphones are great. They fit snug on my ear and the volume gets pretty loud but the noise cancelling feature is just mediocre, that's the only reason I didn't give 5 stars, other than that great for the price and a nice free traveling case when I have my train rides.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Now it has major feedback issues in one ear and is useless.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted about 5 months with very minimal use. Now it has major feedback issues in one ear and is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Warthog

customer_reviews.title: The product arrived on time and was just as described ...
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time and was just as described. My daughter loves them and will use them a lot. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amara Sage

customer_reviews.title: Very good headphones
customer_reviews.text: So far I really enjoy the Paw headphones. The playback is good and they do a great job blocking out the world around me. The only negative is i have to mess with connecting the device even though it's already paired, but it finally does connect. I am happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Dale Ostrander

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value and sound, I also purchased the WaveSound 3 after buying these another great product by Paww
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: ... the airplane from SD to NYC -- they were great and so happy to not be tied down by ...
customer_reviews.text: Just used them on the airplane from SD to NYC -- they were great and so happy to not be tied down by a cord!
customer_reviews.author: HARTFORD HOTDOG

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable noise cancelling headphones
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable noise cancelling headphones; arrived in time for Christmas. Blue tooth connection is very easy to set up, and the sound is quite good.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Sound on podcasts is fine. Price was right on special
customer_reviews.text: Heavy and bulky but i listened to podcasts for a 4 hour bus trip without much discomfort. Forgot to turn off blue toothe so the battery rN down and couldnt listen on bus trip home. Sound on podcasts is fine. Price was right on special.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Urich

customer_reviews.title: My husband texted me and said they were the best he has ever had for air plane use
customer_reviews.text: My husband texted me and said they were the best he has ever had for air plane use! He loved them on his trip!
customer_reviews.author: MF

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These headset work really good and are very comfortable. Amazing sound and noise cancellation.
customer_reviews.author: Kl

product_meta.title: Paww Over Ear Headphones - Paww WaveSound 2 - Active Noise Cancelling Bluetooth Headphones with Custom Carry Case - Black
product_meta.description: Engineered for comfort and durability, the WaveSound 2 Bluetooth over-ear headphones are preferred by everyone from audiophiles and mobile DJs to daily commuters and frequent Combining Bluetooth 4.0 connectivity with active noise canceling, NFC for speedy syncing, the WaveSound 2 headphones provide an excellent value proposition for anyone looking for new over-ear headphones. These aren't your average wireless headphones. Unlike other over-ear headphone models on the market today, the Paww WaveSound 2 offers an impressive 36 HOURS of playtime when in Bluetooth mode. If the rechargeable battery happens to deplete, simply plug the noise canceling headphones into your smartphone, tablet or computer using the included 3.5mm auxiliary cable while you charge it up. Each WaveSound 2 Over-Ear Headphones Package includes: - 1 Pair of Bluetooth Over-Ear Headphones - 1 Custom Built Travel Case - 1 Micro USB Charging Cord - 1 Premium 3.5mm Auxiliary Cable - 1 Airline Adapter - 1 User Manual Disclaimer: This product has been designed to be used in Bluetooth mode The auxiliary connection has been provided simply as a backup option to ensure that you can continue listening to music, even when the battery is drained. The active noise cancelling mode will only work in Bluetooth mode, and will switch off when the auxiliary cable is plugged in.
feature_bullets: BEST HEADPHONES FOR QUALITY SOUND: Crafted using the latest noise minimizing technology, the Paww WaveSound 2 Bluetooth Headphones are key to enjoying your favorite tunes, movies and TV shows without noisy interruptions

ALL-IN-ONE HEADPHONES: Equipped with an on-board mic and audio controls, taking calls, controlling the volume and shuffling playlists or skipping songs is super easy when using these realtone headphones
COMPLETE HEADPHONES KIT: Each pair of our Paww WaveSound 2 Wireless Headphones includes a sturdy storage case, a micro-USB cable for on the go charging and a premium 3.5 mm audio cable
INCREDIBLE BATTERY LIFE: Our premium noise-canceling headphones have an incredible 800 mAH battery that gives you up to 36 hours of listening time and is user replaceable

GREAT FOR MUSIC LOVERS: These over-ear headphone kits make a fabulous present idea for traveling professionals, daily commuters, music lovers, students and so much more! They are compatible with just about every smartphone, tablet, laptop computer or desktop that is outfitted with Bluetooth technology
